name: @scoping/functions
description: My Azure Functions for scheduled automations

scripts.clean: cmd --% /c "(if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) & (if exist build rmdir /s /q build) & (if exist .eslintcache del /f /q .eslintcache)" || rm -rf dist build .eslintcache
scripts.postbuild: npm run lint || echo "Lint failed. Continuing..."
scripts.start: cmd --% /c "(if exist svelte.config.js (npm run start:svelte) else (npm run start:ts))" || bash -c 'if [ -f svelte.config.js ]; then npm run start:svelte; else npm run start:ts; fi'
